caption: Dr. Elara Voss glides through the lecture hall, her deep red velvet blazer slipping off one shoulder as she hands out wrapped gifts to wide-eyed students. ❄️✨ The warm glow of fairy lights contrasts with frosty windows, while her knowing smirk hints at the sensual power she wields beyond academics. 🎄📚 #ProfessorGlam #ChristmasVibes #SexyScholar #WinterWonders #AcademicAttraction
